text:
Front Row Education -- San Francisco -- ONSITE -- https://www.frontrowed.com

Role 1: Haskell Web Engineer (http://frontrow.workable.com/jobs/67247)

Role 2: Infrastructure Engineer (http://frontrow.workable.com/jobs/70963)

Come change how millions of US students learn Math and ELA. Super small, tight-knit team in downtown SF. One of the world's highest traffic Haskell products, ever. Big presence and stewardship of the community. Work with Open Source authors whose work is used by many. Use the best and simplest tools for the job, preserve the no-firefighting culture, sleep soundly at night. Front Row is venture funded, has a proven business model and is on the road to profitability.

Keywords: Haskell, React, Flow, Ansible, AWS, PostgreSQL
